author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.

author: Seneca
quote: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.

author: Epictetus
quote: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: You have power over your mind—not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.

author: Seneca
quote: We suffer more in imagination than in reality.

author: Epictetus
quote: He who is not a good servant will not be a good master.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: The only way to deal with the future is to prepare for it.

author: Seneca
quote: Sometimes even to live is an act of courage.

author: Epictetus
quote: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars, and see yourself running with them.

author: Seneca
quote: A good character, a good life, and a good death are all one thing.

author: Epictetus
quote: No man is free who is not a master of himself.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: The universe is change; our life is what our thoughts make it.

author: Seneca
quote: If a man knows not to which port he sails, no wind is favorable.

author: Epictetus
quote: Freedom is the only worthy goal in life. It is won by disregarding things that lie beyond our control.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: You can’t control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you.

author: Seneca
quote: The whole future lies in uncertainty: live immediately.

author: Epictetus
quote: People are not disturbed by things, but by the views they take of them.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.

author: Seneca
quote: There is nothing more honorable than a grateful heart.

author: Epictetus
quote: It's not the things themselves that disturb us, but our opinions about them.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: In the morning, when you rise unwillingly, let this thought be present: I am rising to the work of a human being.

author: Seneca
quote: He suffers more than necessary, who suffers before it is necessary.

author: Epictetus
quote: Seek not the good in external things; seek it in yourselves.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injury.

author: Seneca
quote: Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.

author: Epictetus
quote: No great thing is created suddenly.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: Do not be ashamed to ask for help.

author: Seneca
quote: One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood.

author: Epictetus
quote: Don't explain your philosophy. Embody it.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: The soul becomes dyed with the color of its thoughts.

author: Seneca
quote: To wish to be well is a part of becoming well.

author: Epictetus
quote: When someone is properly grounded in life, they shouldn't have to look outside themselves for approval.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: It is not death that a man should fear, but he should fear never beginning to live.

author: Seneca
quote: You could leave life right now. Let that determine what you do and say and think.

author: Epictetus
quote: If you want to improve, be content to be thought foolish and stupid.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: Remember that very little is needed for a happy life.

author: Seneca
quote: Sometimes we are bound to be sorrowful; yet we ought to remember that we are alive.

author: Epictetus
quote: The essence of good is a constant mind.
